title: HOUR 3 - Jeff Monken
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Jeff Monken
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Doug Gottlieb--in for Colin--welcomes Army head football coach Jeff Monken to the show to discuss rebuilding the program, how his team responded after the late-season loss to Navy, and the Black Knights' win over Missouri in the Lockheed Martin Armed Forces Bowl. Plus, The Athletic's Laker insider Jovan Buha joins The Herd to explain what plans could be next for the struggling Los Angeles Lakers. Finally, Doug's "Best for Last!"

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
